name: node-server-template
description: Simple Node.js server with babel, minimal tooling (nodemon, standard), and mocha tests. Can be used as a template to quickly bootstrap yor Node.js server projects.

scripts.lint: standard --verbose | snazzy && echo 'JavaScript Standard Style lint complete.'
scripts.lint:fix: standard  --verbose --fix | snazzy && echo 'JavaScript Standard Style fix complete.'
scripts.coverage: npx nyc --reporter=html npm run test && npx http-server coverage
scripts.doc: npx jsdoc --recurse --destination ./doc --package ./package.json src && npx http-server doc
